all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
But if any provide not for his own, and specially for those of his own house, he hath denied the faith, and is worse than an infidel.
1 Timothy 5:8
Quote of the Day
"Christ’s Resurrection frees us from death, from time’s frailties and physicality’s imperfections."
Elder Gerrit W. Gong | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
